name: Double angle of 2D vector
description: Let's vector (x,y) = (r cos φ, r sin φ). This function returns other vector (x',y') = (r cos 2φ, r sin 2φ).

out_ports.name: xy
out_ports.hint: 2-channel matrix, where x is the first channel and y is the second channel

controls.caption: What to return for almost zero vector (x,y)?
controls.name: resultForZeroVector

controls.caption: Normalized source
controls.description: If set, we suppose that the source vector (x,y) is already normalized (r=1).
controls.name: normalizedSource

controls.caption: Normalized result
controls.description: If set, we return normalized result (cos2φ, sin 2φ) instead of (r cos2φ, r sin 2φ).
controls.name: normalizedResult
